Package: sk.hax.software.darksigns.client

[Groovy] Class Scan

      • sk.hax.software.darksigns.client.Scan

      • Simple network and port scanner. Scans network or ports based on input arguments. Scanning is performed by sending null packets to the target and waiting for a response.

        Authors:
        mio

        • Properties Summary

            Properties 
            Type Name and description
            int  address
            Address or start address input argument.
            int  mode
            Mode of operation (0 - network scan, 1 - port scan).
            int  port
            Port or start port input argument.
            int  timeout
            Scan timeout in milliseconds.
            int  toAddress
            End address input argument.
            int  toPort
            End port input argument.

        • Methods Summary

            Methods 
            Type Name and description
            void handle(byte[] data)
            void start()
